mapper.select:
SELECT j.* FROM ( SELECT jia.ID, jia.ACT_INST_ID, jia.PARENT_ACT_INST_ID, jia.EXECUTION_ID, jia.PROC_INST_ID, jia.ROOT_PROC_INST_ID, jia.ACT_ID, jia.ACT_NAME, jia.ACT_TYPE, jia.STATUS, jia.LOG_KEY, jia.BIZ_URI, IFNULL(ha.START_TIME_, jia.START_TIME) as START_TIME, IFNULL(ha.END_TIME_, jia.END_TIME) as END_TIME, IFNULL(ha.DURATION_, jia.DURATION) as DURATION, ri.INCIDENT_MSG_ AS LOG_TEXT FROM ${tablePrefix}job_instance_act jia LEFT JOIN act_ru_incident ri ON jia.EXECUTION_ID = ri.EXECUTION_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_actinst ha ON jia.EXECUTION_ID = ha.EXECUTION_ID_ AND jia.ACT_ID = ha.ACT_ID_) j
and j.ACT_ID = #{actId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
